headline: Citizens Financial Group Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Earnings Conference Call Details
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 06, 2025--As previously announced, Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) will report its fourth quarter and full year 2024 earnings on January 17, 2025. The news release and supplemental materials will be available at http://investor.citizensbank.com. CFG management will host a live conference call that morning with details as follows:
